title: Lensman
occurrences: Kimball Kinnison. . .  You have been chosen to be a Lensman.
Was that man a Lensman. . .?  But. . . can this sort of thing HAPPEN?
I don't know. . .  However, if Kim has been chosen as a Lensman . . . .
Kim has been chosen as a Lensman.  My Kim. . . No. We must protect the Lensman. . .!
You. . .  are now very important.  You've been charged with a great mission, something of the wonderful power of this universe. You've become a Lensman. . .  Follow that your whole life, Kim!
I think that only the loss of his arm kept him from being a Lensman himself. That was Gary's dream.
"Kim. . .  you have now been charged with a very great mission. . . . This wonderful power of the universe; you are a Lensman. . .  That will stay with you your whole life. . . ."
I have a report to make, Lord Helmuth. The Lensman landed on a planet, which has been destroyed. However, just before we destroyed it, another ship was seen leaving the planet.
Do you assert that the Lensman is extinguished?
Then you don't KNOW if the Lensman is dead?
Lord Helmuth, surely the Lensman was on the planet. . .
